feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing leaderboard data update for ranks 1 and 2.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the ArtistLeaderboardPage with global styles.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Arti: Responsive artist row displaying rank, avatar, scores, and badges with coffee‑minimal styling.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Hype: Small saffron‑accented badge showing a flame icon for top‑trending artists.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Wrapper component rendering the leaderboard header and list of ArtistRow entries.
Desktop‑only header row labeling Rank, Artist, Reach Score, and Trend.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Rank: Indicator showing positive, negative, or neutral reach score shifts with icons and colors.
frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSampl: Sample leaderboard dataset with Atif Aslam and Arijit Singh as ranks 1 and 2.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and updating a backend actor based on Internet Identity state with react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider managing identities, login flow, and persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/components/utilities plus extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes, mandala background utilities, and global body styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistLeaderboardPage: Renders the Artist Leaderboard page using the Leaderboard component with themed mandala background and footer attribution.
frontend/src/types/leaderboard.ts: Defines the Artist interface used for leaderboard data, including rank, avatar, scores, and trending status.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, and design direction, noting a shift to a light blue background for the leaderboard.
